description: This week was pretty quiet on the ransomware front, with most of the attention on the seizure of the BreachForums data theft forum. However, that does not mean there was nothing of interest released this week about ransomware. [...]
title: The Week in Ransomware - May 17th 2024 - Mailbombing is back

description: Starting in July, Microsoft will begin gradually enforcing multi-factor authentication (MFA) for all users signing into Azure to administer resources. [...]
title: Microsoft to start enforcing Azure multi-factor authentication in July

description: ​The U.S. Department of Justice charged two suspects for allegedly leading a crime ring that laundered at least $73 million from cryptocurrency investment scams, also known as "pig butchering." [...]
title: US arrests suspects behind $73M ‘pig butchering’ laundering scheme

description: The WebTPA Employer Services (WebTPA) data breach disclosed earlier this month is impacting close to 2.5 million individuals, the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services notes. [...]
title: WebTPA data breach impacts 2.4 million insurance policyholders
